displaytitle: A Premonitional Work / Guardian Ghosting / Hupa Tribal Territory / Trinity River, Humboldt County / California
inscribed:
Inscribed in pencil on board, recto below lower right corner of image: Thomas
Inscribed in pencil, recto lower right corner of board:  A/P.
Inscribed in ink, verso center:  from:  A Premonitional Work / (part three only of a three part work) / Guardian Ghosting / Hupa Tribal Territory / Trinity River, Humboldt County / California, 1980 / © Thomas Joshua Cooper unique A//P / neg 1980 // print 1980 / my first picture made back in the U.S. upon my / “permanent” return from England in 1979
